_sText: MG_MK_ABSTRACT BY UNREAL MG_MK stands for mini-game mortal kombat, this is the second map to be released on other upcoming maps of its style. This game-mod basicly consists in punching your enemies down. In this map I was looking forward to make something fun, actractive and not boring to play, its a random simetrical platform, with two ramps on each side that boost players, and a healing thingy on the top platform and it is reachable as long as bunnyhopping is enabled. Note: Knife damage was removed on this level, so punching is the only way to kill enemies. I hope you guys like it and have fun! www.FRAGXL.com
